description.en:
Adjust storage capacities for silos, productions, and animal husbandries.
Supports multiplayer with permission system - admins can modify any storage, farm managers can modify their farm's storage.
Features: - Press K at any storage to open capacity dialog - Edit capacity for each fill type - Settings persist across save/load - Full multiplayer support
Supported: - Silos and warehouses - Production storage - Husbandry output (milk, manure) - Animal food troughs
Not Supported: - Bunker silos (terrain-based)
Console Commands: - ascList: Show all storages - ascSet <index> <fillType> <capacity>: Set capacity - ascReset <index> [fillType]: Reset to original
Changelog: 0.1.0.0: - Initial alpha release - GUI dialog for viewing and editing storage capacities - Inline editing with double-click or Enter - Full multiplayer support with permissions - Console commands for advanced users
Documentation: https://github.com/rittermod/FS25_AdjustStorageCapacity
